website_summaries.verdict: Another great option if you're looking for a pure soy protein powder without any additives.
pros: Pure soy protein with no additives or sweeteners
One bag will last you a long time
cons: Difficult to mix, so it's best if you use a blender

customer_reviews.title: Best Soy Protein for Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I used this Soy Protein in shakes every morning for breakfast. Great product at a great price. I mix it with non-fat plain Greek yogurt, leftover coffee, some water, ice and it's delicious, filling and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Ginmint

customer_reviews.title: Good protein if you can't do whey
customer_reviews.text: It's good to add to soups or other things you're trying to thicken with protein. It does have a taste and doesn't mix perfectly but it's a good nutritional supplement. Don't add more than 1/8 cup to each 1 cup of liquid or it significantly alters the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good soy protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time trying this brand and it does taste pretty good. I mix it with water, flavoring, ground flax seeds, mix with a fork and let stand for about 10 - 15 min. to let any lumps dissolve. Some powder still sticks to the sides of the glass, but I keep stirring while drinking. On the fence whether I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SaraTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great in yogurt and smoothies, etc!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help in my recovery from foot surgery, after my surgeon mentioned protein helps heal wounds. I was worried about grittiness or bad taste but determined to eat it for my recuperation. But wow, I've eaten it in hot cereal, homemade yogurt, and smoothies and can't taste it at all. All in all, it's a painless way to add protein to your diet. And right now I'm all about anything that does NOT cause pain.
customer_reviews.author: Devani Scheidler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder mixes into everything. Most protein powders have too much flavor, even “unflavored” and “unsweetened” can have loads of added flavorings. Other plain protein powders like whey or hemp have strong flavors or textures. This is the most plain, easy to use that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy10

customer_reviews.title: Not the Quality I Expect from Bob's Red Mill
customer_reviews.text: I always add gluten free protein to my overnight oatmeal concoctions. I created a new recipe and thought soy protein powder would be better than peanut butter powder. Honestly, I found this soy protein powder to be like eating paste. Or what I imagine that to be like. It was too thick. It was clumpy. It seemed to suck all of the flavor out of the rest of the concoction. I'm giving it one more try with only one tablespoon added. If that doesn't help, I'll see lif any of my friends want it and I'll buy an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Sora

customer_reviews.title: I love Bob's Red Mill products!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had found this at my local Meijer years ago but it since seems to have disappeared from their shelves...I was quite happy to find it here @ Amazon, although it will probably take me forever to use this entire shipment!! Four bags is an awful lot of it, I'm afraid, LOL. A very good source of protein, esp for someone like me who is slightly underweight & not extremely active, due to joint & circulation issues... I thoroughly recommend this product. As an added thought ~ try their other products! They have quite an extensive line of cereals, supplements, etc. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Defillippo

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Needed this specifically for an allergy tolerance program. It is critical for us to have a pure soy product and this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s high in protein, and inexpensive, but I don’t like the taste. I think that the flavor is terrible and just completely overwhelms. I doubt that I’ll buy it again because of that. I have had other brands that didn’t have that taste, but they are much more money. I guess you can’t have it all.
customer_reviews.author: Fur Mama

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect to pour it in your coffee & stir it in with a fork or spoon unless you like soy protein clumps in your mouth
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't mix as well as everyone says unless you put it in the blender. Do not expect to pour it in your coffee & stir it in with a fork or spoon unless you like soy protein clumps in your mouth. Love that is has a neutral taste. Always been a fan or bob's red mill products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this protein powder. Taste is extremely mild. I put the amount I want in a blender with either water or soymilk (or half and half), frozen banana, unsweetened cocoa powder, ice cubes and blend until smooth. Makes a very nice smoothy. When it's too cold for a smoothy, I omit the frozen banana & ice cubes and blend just the powder, liquid & cocoa powder...then heat it up and it makes a tasty, high protein cup of hot chocolate! Highly recommend! (Using a blender is an absolute must!)
customer_reviews.author: forest haven

customer_reviews.title: easy to use protein boost
customer_reviews.text: I am on a special diet for medical problems and this soy protein powder helps me get enough protein each day easily by adding it to other foods. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: geb

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Soy Protein
customer_reviews.text: Bought Bob's to replace the Trader Joe's soy protein I had been buying for years, which they stopped carrying. Bob's soy protein powder has a pleasant taste when mixed with milk. It dissolves well, and using it daily, I've only needed two cases to last three months. I'm completely satisfied with it and will continue to buy it indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Latulipe

customer_reviews.title: Great. No taste. Blends easy.
customer_reviews.text: Great product blends really well and truly tasteless! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Lia Jay

customer_reviews.title: WATCH FOR ALLERGIES
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE. This soy protein isolate is manufactured in a facility that also uses tree nuts and soy. If you or loved ones have allergies, this won't work for them, and the product description does not list this warning. (Though it is stated on the product itself.) I can't return this item, so now I'm stuck paying for something my family cannot use. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nutrition stats, very over powering taste
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this Soy Protein powder, since it does not have any added sugar. I have a sensitive palate and the taste is just too much for me. When I mix it with other ingredients such as bananas and almond milk, all I feel I can taste is soy. I will not be repurchasing this product again. Now to figure out how to use up my already purchased bag...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Schmidt-McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very long lasting protein. It dissolves and mixes well in liquid! I use it in my homemade ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline G

customer_reviews.title: Good product, wish they offered an intermediate size bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. I keep a container in the refrigerator, blended with soy milk, vanilla, and a banana. I now buy it in a big sack. Wish they had a smaller sack, though!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Aronson

customer_reviews.title: Buying the big bag is economical. But getting the protein powder out of the big bag is a challenge.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my protein drinks. Doesn't taste as good as my former protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: jerry jones

customer_reviews.title: Natural but difficult to dissolve completely
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several brands of soy protein powder and this brand is definitively more natural but it still doesn't dissolve "perfectly" even though I use much less than recommended and also with heat on a stove. I always taste a little of the powder.
customer_reviews.author: goonbear

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to protein bars and smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in a protein bar recipe by Alton Brown. I don't really know how to review it. It did what I needed it to do, add protein. I'll buy more when I use this first bag up.
customer_reviews.author: Gary In Mississippi

customer_reviews.title: USA product you can trust.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Bob's Red Mill Isolated Soy Protein for years and I will continue to take it to supplement my diet. It gives me enough energy to do my daily exercise at the gym. Before going to the gym or mowing the lawn (using push mower) I take a blend of one scoop (about 28 grams) of soy Protein and 1 cup of orange juice. Anyone who needs a mild protein supplement, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tomahawk One

customer_reviews.title: loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to make protein bars, also added some in my yogurt, loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Mita Majumdar

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and CHEAPEST, soy protein powder out there, and it tastes so good!!! It has a wonderful flavor, not vanilla, just plain, but it still makes things taste great, and has alot of nututional value. This pack of 4 will last us 3 months or more. Compared to spending at least $10, to $15, at the health food store, for a container, it is much more cost effective to purchase Red Mill. Love this company!!!!
customer_reviews.author: maca peru

customer_reviews.title: Amazing texture
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t find soy protein anywhere! I live the chalky flavor/texture it gives to my smoothies. I use it every day and the bag is almost empty. Just remember a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Harvey

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It is okay. Has a weird taste if use too much in a product and doesn't dissolve as well as I would like. Have decided not to buy this type of stuff anymore, just eat more healthy.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: So far this is the best protein powder I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best protein powder I’ve tried. Doesn’t have all the added junk, just protein and it’s cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the low calorie count, but the taste takes some getting used to and it doesn't mix easily into liquids. Despite the taste and clumpy quality, this stuff has really grown on me for some reason. Not sure how strongly I'd recommend this to someone else, but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Fette

customer_reviews.title: Great protein source!
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder. In the past, I've found the taste of whey protein disagreeable, even in a protein shake with chocolate, banana, and peanut butter (you'd think that all those yummy ingredients would mask the taste). This powder mixes very well, has very little taste, and is a great thickening agent. I've added the powder to yogurt, oatmeal, and pancake batter. I just mixed 4 oz. of almond milk with 4 Tbsp. of the powder, half a banana, and a few blueberries and ate the mixture as a refreshing pudding. Delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: lachinita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This whey mixes well with food, and agrees with my sensitive stomach issues
customer_reviews.author: TheRose321

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: Terrific; a staple in this household. Mixes easily with water with five seconds of fork agitation. Smooth result with no globs. Vitually no taste or aftertaste. Unfortunately I see there has been a recent (9-2001) significant price rise but probably not specific to this brand as there has been a shortfall in soybean crop this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable substitute if a person can't use Whey Protein
customer_reviews.text: A bit chalky tasting in smoothies, but not offensively so. It's Okay...not wonderful, not awful...just okay. If it provides the protein I need, then I'll continue to purchase it. I don't know of any better substitute since I am allergic to casein and whey.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Love this Soy Protein - it has no sugar and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this Soy Protein - it has no sugar and it blends well with oats and other fruits and almond milk. It is almost unnoticeable in the smoothie and I love it. I drink this everyday.
customer_reviews.author: GKM

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great!
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is absolutely delicious! It blends well with no clumps, chunks, or residue. It has a wonderful taste that I recognize from smoothies I've had at "real" smoothie bars. My homemade smoothies now taste like I bought them from a shop! I only wish I had bought the 28 oz bags instead of the 14 oz bags. Will definitely correct that for next time!
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: Economical and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am a runner and mix this with orange juice after a run. It mixes in easily and the taste is very similar to an expensive soy protein mixture that I used previously. Before using soy protein, I mixed whey powder into my orange juice, but switched to soy protein because it has a much higher percentage of arginine. The soy protein actually stirs in more easily than does whey powder. The taste and texture is very different than whey powder, but I like both.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Great Soy Protein
customer_reviews.text: A soon as this soy protein was delivered to my home, I put 1/4 cup of it in my blender bottle with some cranberry juice and shook it up good..it was not clumpy at all...it was very smooth and I could not taste it which is a plus for me...will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: TRose

customer_reviews.title: Contains Lecithin
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to the bag photos shown, the product I received lists Lecithin which matters because some people are intolerant to Lecithin.
customer_reviews.author: M. L.

customer_reviews.title: A regular staple for me
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. Mixes in well. My fav soy protein. I'll order this again for sure
customer_reviews.author: April-MN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to digest
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as an easy to digest protein source.
customer_reviews.author: Courtenay Lake

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of vegetable based powders and simply wanted something to blend with vegetables, fruits and/or peanut butter depending on the mood. This has been great so far. No matter how much of this stuff I put in a smoothie, I can't taste it. If you need a quick fix, it can be put in a glass of soy or almond milk, but it doesn't mix as well as the blender. Nice product Bob.
customer_reviews.author: John Springer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Bob's Red Mill, a wholly employee-owned establishment, is really top notch: very high quality, very stringent controls, reliable, and with a huge selection of products. Everything of theirs that I have tried has been a-one.
customer_reviews.author: lpj97007

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this to give me an extra protein boost in my after workout drink. It takes a little blending but works well, I use an immersion blender. I also add it to yogurt. It doesn't change the taste, just makes the drink or yogurt thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Lover

customer_reviews.title: good, not great
customer_reviews.text: no taste but that is why i bought it. INGREDIENTS: soy. no artificial junk here. as w/ all protein shakes it has an acquired taste. tip- juice helps it dissolve better (apple, blueberry, or pom)no rumbles in the stomach like Myo**ex. just be careful w/ shelf life as there are no preservatives.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: This soy protein is excellent. It is not sweet in any way so ...
customer_reviews.text: This soy protein is excellent. It is not sweet in any way so do not expect that. I add this powder into my home made granola and energy bars. It mixes well into soy or almond milk so long as you add it slowly and don't use an excessive amount.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I love using this for coating chicken and fish for frying
customer_reviews.text: I love using this for coating chicken and fish for frying, it does not cause a spike in blood sugar after eating anything that's coated with it. Even my non diabetic husband enjoys eating it.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Its got a really bad aftertaste. Maybe I'm not used to soy products
customer_reviews.text: Its got a really bad aftertaste. Maybe I'm not used to soy products, but the taste was really hard to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: eee1324

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works best to add to baked goods; a little grity in smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: uncimaka

customer_reviews.title: Protein in Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my smoothies to get some added protein. Mixes great!
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Isolated Soy Protein powder exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff for protein enhancement of smoothies and this was exactly what I wanted, well-packaged in bags of 140z. or so (don't remember their exact size now). Next time I need more of this, I will definitely order this exact same product again. No question.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality product
customer_reviews.text: i had never tried this product until this purchase. i am very pleased with it. it dissolves quickly......i use milk........without lumps or a gritty texture/taste. i also tried it in fruit smoothies and it was very good. i am very pleased with my purchase and i like the fact that it is packaged in bags that are just big enough to hold the contents......other powders often come in huge, oversized containers.......it makes it easy to store the packages in the freezer. this will be my choice of powder for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A Rice

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for a protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for smoothies. I really like it because it is tasteless and has good protein content. You'll need a blender to mix it. The price is great!!
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: but this isn't as bad as I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried any other kind, but this isn't as bad as I was expecting. After the first bag I don't mind it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Bob's Red Mill Soy Protein
customer_reviews.text: I've used various products from Bob's Red Mill over the years and always have been pleased with the outcome. Finding this 4-pack box of Soy Protein was wonderful. I have been following a low-carb diet for several years and added some new recipes recently asking for Soy Protein which is very difficult to find and when I did, was paying a lot for a small packet. This was a wonderful find for me. The packaging is convenient and the product is excellent. Great value for money and I know it's good, cos it's under the Bob's Red Mill label.
customer_reviews.author: Misstery

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Had a small problem with delivery but got it straightened out.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Sacker

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product mixes well with banana/strawberries/apples in my Vita Mix. I eat a low fat vegan diet. Do cardio daily and resistance workouts 4 times a week. Wanted to ensure my body has enough protein.
customer_reviews.author: Lex Rex

customer_reviews.title: Best There Is
customer_reviews.text: Tried them all. This is hands down the best. No sugar, flavoring, or filler. Well packaged, as in no mishaps carrying it on vaca over 12 weeks. Stores well in the freezer or the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Cato The Eldest

customer_reviews.title: I like being able to make a little at a time
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to make a little at a time. my store bought soy milk was going bad before I could use it all.
customer_reviews.author: S. wilson

customer_reviews.title: ... little chalky so keep that in mind but a great addition to my morning shake
customer_reviews.text: A little chalky so keep that in mind but a great addition to my morning shake!!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Terrific buy!
customer_reviews.text: After trying other similar products, I found Bob's and and am delighted to say it not only is a good buy, but its quality is superior. It mixes much better and provides the protein I need, having given up dairy products. Recommend very highly!
customer_reviews.author: Janan Broadbent

customer_reviews.title: Breast cancer health!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received product on time! I purchased this product for breast cancer health!!! So far, so good! Looking forward to reviewing the health benefits of this product!!:-) :-)
customer_reviews.author: CherylG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have found so many uses for this, in smoothies and baking.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect product for making affordable tasty protein bars
customer_reviews.author: Bill IV

customer_reviews.title: Chalky if you use too much
customer_reviews.text: It does what you expect. If you add it to something, you will increase the protein content. It has a flavor, like chalk. And the powder is sticky in things like smoothies, so you have to use the correct ratio of powder to liquid or you will feel like you are drinking liquified classroom chalk. I bet it will go great in a homemade cake or bread. You could easily add 3 or 4 grams of protein per serving without changing the flavor much.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bob's Soy Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I count on this to get enough protein, since I'm a vegan. For protein, I eat nuts, beans, nutritional yeast, but I get about 50 grams of protein from the soy powder. I mix it with soymilk for morning cereal, and with berries for dessert...tastes lovely and creamy, but mix well to avoid powder lumps! Being fond of sweet tastes, I add Stevia, which is an acquired taste. Since soy is all protein, and Stevia sweeter than sugar, it helps keep calories down.
customer_reviews.author: B. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Soy protein recommended by someone else and I can't wait to try it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it got here so fast and boy do I appreciate this because I was running out of the soy protein that I usually get. I will more than likely just order this on line from now on. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Apryl Kisandria Varga

customer_reviews.title: Nice cake flour texture
customer_reviews.text: Nice cake flour texture. Not sweet, of course. Has only a slight bland vanilla flavor which is undetectable in smoothies. Mixes easily.
customer_reviews.author: Unique Name

customer_reviews.title: Missing content
customer_reviews.text: The is great protein powder. There was one missing package in this 4 count box. So it was way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy More.
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder does the job. It tastes almost semi-neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Tam Le

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product - just remember IT IS NOT FLAVORED! :)
customer_reviews.author: EJ Keitelbach

customer_reviews.title: No Problems
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this protein powder. Able to build muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Tam Le

customer_reviews.title: Oh my.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this does what it's supposed to, but wow. It is REALLY gritty even when buried in a delicious fruit and yogurt smoothie. I'm going to have to try something else, I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: lumbrgirl

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this protein powder. I add it to pasta sauce, smoothies, etc and we haven't been able to taste it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: Slight aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: Has a slight aftertaste but not too bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Runner Girl 7

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, like the larger size, it's much less expensive than buying the smaller bags in a store, and the shipping is great!
customer_reviews.author: djreg

customer_reviews.title: This is not good for mixing into smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This is not good for mixing into smoothies, it gives the smoothie an almost gritty texture, and I don't like the way it tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Goooood tasting protein
customer_reviews.text: My recipe was simple Bananas Mangos (and/or strawberries) Milk Protinex Delicious smoothie. I'd put 2 servings of powder in it. good way to get vegan protein. I can't tell you the results of working out with it yet - it hasn't been very long. But I do feel like I'm recovering faster
customer_reviews.author: M Anand

customer_reviews.title: Truely Great
customer_reviews.text: I make my own protein bars and this tastes great and bakes well. I will probably set it up to be delivered regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Courageous

customer_reviews.title: Nice protein supplement with minimal taste
customer_reviews.text: This product is a nice protein powder that has a relatively discrete taste. I like to use it to replace a portion of the flour in baking recipes.
customer_reviews.author: JonB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Unflavored, yay! It's very hard to get a basic protein powder without all the additives and flavors, so this did the trick nicely!
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: This is great, 100% plain soy protein powder with no additives
customer_reviews.text: This is great, 100% plain soy protein powder with no additives. I mix with milk for breakfast shakes, I find it has a very neutral flavor, so it works with whatever I add.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Soy Protein For Shakes
customer_reviews.text: My local grocery store stopped carrying the bulk soy protein and I chose this to replace it. I liked the bags came in a display box that easily fit into my pantry. Good quality and taste compared to other soy protein powder I have had. I use it in my nutrition shakes every day.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie C

customer_reviews.title: Great Lactose Free Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this powder because I wanted a protien powder that is not whey or milk based as I am allergic to milk. I use it in protein smoothies of all sorts and in hot or cold liquid. It disolves fairly easily and does not have much of a flavor. I also like that it does not have a bunch of additives and chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: R. John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Just the product I've been searching for.
customer_reviews.text: Does not override the taste of the produce I mix it with. Does not affect my tummy in any miserable way like most protein powders do. Delivered to my doorstep in the blink of an eye. Another terrific product from Bob's Red Mill.
customer_reviews.author: Honorable

customer_reviews.title: Did not like it.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Bobs Red Mill products many times and have always had good luck with them.. always fresh and yummy... I was so anxious for this to arrive.. I hurried and made a smoothie right away after it came. Arrugh. It tasted so awful. Nothing I added would mask the flavor.. almost tasted like it was fermented. Nasty. Now I'm stuck with a product I can't return because I poured it into a container and threw away the bag it came in. I had no idea it would taste so terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia R. McCollum

customer_reviews.title: A good source of low cal vegan protein from soybeans
customer_reviews.text: Works great in smoothies and on cereal. For that protein we all need. Not gritty. A fine powder texture No taste to speak of. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Oldme

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, ethical, easy to use,  no frills protein supplement.
customer_reviews.text: This product looses a star only in comparison to more expensive protein supplements that come with flavoring. It dissolves easily and fully with no lumps provided a reasonable amount of water (8 to 12oz per scoop). The taste is better than pure pea protein powder and tolerable as pure protein powders go. If taste is the main factor then I would advise a flavored powder like Sun Warrior or Vega, and to be used in a shake or milk of some kind. This is far cheaper in terms of grams of protein per dollar than other premixed powders with flavorings, added vitamins, fiber, carbs, etc. While still being vegan.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this as a no sugar protein substitute that tastes much better than whey protein!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good but find I use my almond flour more for texture.
customer_reviews.author: Mountainlady

customer_reviews.title: It's straight protein!!
customer_reviews.text: It's straight protein, and that's what I like best about it. Most other brands of protein powder are diluted with all sorts of stuff I'm trying to avoid like sugar, cholestrol, fats, and carbohydrates. But Bob's Red Mill Soy Protein Powder has none of that stuff. It's also easy to use in almost any way you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D. Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find this product as I use Protein powder in many things that I bake and cook. I feel it is important to have plenty of protein in ones diet that does not include fats. It is helping my fingernails to grow and harden which is something I have been fighting. Letta
customer_reviews.author: Letta Meinen

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Health Store Brand
customer_reviews.text: After using store brand soy protein powder for more than five years, my source went out of business. I stumbled upon Bob's Red Mill and found it to be superior to anything else I've used. It mixes easily with milk and fruit for a smoothy and the taste is so mild, it does not interfer with the other flavors in the drink. This is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zukas

customer_reviews.title: Hassle-free, simple protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This powder dissolves readily and mixes smoothly. I like to put some in my orange juice, and I can mix it in just a few seconds by swishing it around with a fork. No clumps, no chalky flavor or texture. The taste is pleasant and can blend in with anything you would want to add protein powder to. Also, I appreciate that it's not full of additives and artificial sweeteners or flavors....just plain soy protein powder and nothing more. This protein powder is a great addition to smoothies, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Excellent everything!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first time I've ordered from this dealer. Invariably my product arrives quickly, before I expect it, and packaged so there is no possibility of damage. I'm very happy to have found this source for my protein, which cannot be purchased in Nashville, at least for close to the same price. I expect to use this dealer as my sole source from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Bette Carter

customer_reviews.title: This is more coarse than the soy protein I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: This is more coarse than the soy protein I've had in the past. That said, I believe it packs more of a punch, it seems more substantial. I like to mix it with 8 oz. milk, 1/2 banana and a little sweetener. When I have it for breakfast, it lasts until mid-afternoon. I have more energy and alertness than when I eat, say, an egg and piece of toast.
customer_reviews.author: DiYo

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different soy bean powders. I mix 1/2 soy protein and 1/2 slimfast each morning for a shake that will stick with you until lunchtime. I have found Bob's Red Mill soy protein to be a quality product. It is comprable to much higher priced brands.
customer_reviews.author: Stefunee

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I wanted to make my own shakes and the price was incredible. I am too lazy though and just dissolve a scoop of it in water with a spoon. It dissolves great, tastes like flour.. I wouldn't recommend doing it this way. I need to find some good recipe's for it. Tip: I dumped all 4 bags into one of those big Creatine / Whey Protein jugs you find at walmart and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: King Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great for Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I use Bob's Red Mill Isolated Soy Protein Powder daily in my fruit smoothies. I'm a runner and need the protein. Mixes well with soy milk or chocolate milk. No taste. I am on the auto-ship program. Recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly N. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not something I liked
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 2 stars because it's not the products fault that I don't like soy. The powder itself seems fine. I wanted to try this as I usually have whey protein and thought perhaps soy would be a good change. I didn't like the texture it gave my smoothie or the after taste. I tried to use it twice and both times I didn't drink the smoothie. I'll stick to whey protein.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: MANUFACTURED WITH TREE NUTS
customer_reviews.text: I checked this out carefully to see if it was manufactured in a facility that processes nuts. When I enlarged the back I did not see it but when I received the package the back of the package was different than the one shown on the website. This is manufactured in a facility that processes Tree Nuts so if you are allergic to any nuts it probably would be best to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipped out immediately...I'm very impressed with the quality of this product
customer_reviews.author: naomi james

product_meta.title: Bob's Red Mill Gluten Free Soy Protein Powder, 14 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Size:14 Ounce (Pack of 1)

Soy Protein Powder is a healthy alternative to animal protein as a plant-based dietary source of complete protein. It is easy to digest, has very little flavor and blends smoothly in liquids so you can add it to drinks and other foods for a quick nutritional boost! One serving offers 11mg of soy isoflavones.

Add soy protein powder to smoothies, protein shakes, yogurt, hot cereal, soups, granola bars, protein bars, pancakes, muffins, brownies, cakes and breads. Try the delicious drink recipe on the back of the package for starters!

Gluten Free - This gluten free product was handled exclusively in our dedicated gluten free facility and tested for gluten free integrity in our quality control laboratory using an ELISA Gluten Assay test.

Kosher - As a continued commitment to the quality of the products we make and sell, all of Bob’s Red Mill products are certified kosher pareve or kosher dairy by Rabbi Avrohom Teichman of Kehilla Kosher, Igud HaKashrus of Los Angeles.
feature_bullets: Our Soy Protein Powder is a nourishing source of complete protein.
This dairy-free, gluten-free, unflavored, unsweetened powder is an easy way for vegans and vegetarians to supplement their protein intake.
Perfect for smoothies, shakes, pancakes, bars and more.
